bibl.title: Syncretism in Panopolis? The Evidence of the "Mary Silk" in the Abegg Stiftung.
bibl.note: Riggisberg, Abegg Stiftung. The "Mary Silk" depicts scenes from the live of the Virgin Mary. The hanging shows Dionysos with his followers (it had been wrapped around the silk, and both around a body in the grave). Panopolis, around A.D. 400.
